title: 大佬进！求命令大佬
author: Thewindyautumn
txt_content:
怎么让玩家踩过的方块消失？
急求，在线等

replies.author: 疑离寒
replies.txt_content: 命令:execute @a ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-1 ~ 检测方块id 方块数据值 setblock ~ ~-1 ~ air [高频]

replies.author: Thewindyautumn
replies.txt_content:
疑离寒 发表于 2019-9-22 14:55
命令:execute @a ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-1 ~ 检测方块id 方块数据值 setblock ~ ~-1 ~ air [高频]
不行呀，我这里显示detect执行错误

replies.author: 疑离寒
replies.txt_content:
Thewindyautumn 发表于 2019-9-22 15:12
不行呀，我这里显示detect执行错误
问题是你版本多少

replies.author: Thewindyautumn
replies.txt_content:
疑离寒 发表于 2019-9-22 15:22
问题是你版本多少
我的世界版本1.12.2

replies.author: 疑离寒
replies.txt_content:
Thewindyautumn 发表于 2019-9-22 16:13
我的世界版本1.12.2
把detect 换成run试试

replies.author: Thewindyautumn
replies.txt_content:
疑离寒 发表于 2019-9-22 16:29
把detect 换成run试试
已经解决了，谢谢
